attributes.action: MPs to attend Reality of Poverty minimum 3wk immersive experience & training
attributes.additional_details:
This must be a fully immersive experience; no access to usual privilege or peer group for a minimum of 21days. All MPs must better understand the many ramifications of living in poverty, not create punitive policies borne of ignorance. 
Psychological Consequences of Poverty: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FdR0NqrlRZo&t=629s
Poverty isn't a lack of character...: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ydKcaIE6O1k&t=29s
https://truepublica.org.uk/united-kingdom/truth-poverty-britain-much-worse-think/
attributes.background: Given many MPs glaring lack of understanding & empathy to the plight of those in poverty (for whatever reason), Cab MPs esp. to be required to more truly experience the actual hardships faced. Mandatory classes on the numerous effects of long-term poverty included. Poverty is NOT a personal defect.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because this would be a decision for individual MPs and not the UK Government or Parliament as a whole.

You could start a petition calling on the UK Government to start an awareness raising campaign about the impact of poverty if that is something you would like to see happen.
